thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 8 of 523
thread.title: Judy

author: Judy
title: Judy
text: My daughter and I love PromGirl.com. They offer an endless supply of quality dresses. This particular purchase is for winter dance. The dress fits her perfectly; the sizing chart was accurate. The dress was delivered in three days. Both of us were shocked when we saw the pink box at the door. My daughter said that in the future, she is purchasing her prom dress from PromGirl.com.
